item.title: Week 2: Visualizing Data
item.description: Grammar of Graphics & ggplot This week we will be discussing what qualities makes a graphic legible and how we can use R to implement readability using the Grammar of Graphics. Tasks Notes Links Due -Add links to The Pudding and make it a reading response (https://pudding.cool/) - add ggplot flipbook (https://evamaerey.github.io/ggplot_flipbook/ggplot_flipbook_xaringan.html#1) note: requires computer (not smart device friendly) - top 10 do and donâ€™t for charts (https://guides.
